description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=3/3. What happens when a cat becomes president and bans wine? Outrage! Rebellion! There's only one solution, and that's using birds to ferment wine. Does that sound absurd? Well it is, but someone has to save America from its sober slumber!
description.short: What happens when a cat becomes president and bans wine? Outrage! Rebellion! There's only one solution, and that's using birds to ferment wine. Does that sound absurd? Well it is, but someone has to save America from its sober slumber!
